SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.*, ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT b.brand_name, prd.prod_no, prd.prod_name, prd.price, prd.reg_date, prd.brand_id, NVL(tra.tran_status_code,'0') tran_status_code, prd.image_file FROM product prd, transaction tra, brand b WHERE tra.prod_no(+) = prd.prod_no AND b.brand_id = prd.brand_id
AND prd.prod_no LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND prd.prod_name LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND prd.price LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
GROUP BY prd.prod_no, prd.prod_name, prd.price, prd.reg_date, tra.tran_status_code, b.brand_name, prd.brand_id, prd.image_file
ORDER BY prd.price DESC
ORDER BY prd.price ASC
) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT prod_name, price, sysdate FROM product
prod_no LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
prod_name LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
price LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY price DESC
ORDER BY price ASC
) countTable
